mapper.select: select p.* from admin_role_relation arr left join role r on arr.role_id = r.id left join role_permission_relation rpr on r.id = rpr.role_id left join permission p on p.id = rpr.permission_id where arr.admin_id = #{adminId} and p.id is not null and p.id not in ( select p.id from admin_permission_relation apr left join permission p on apr.permission_id = p.id where apr.type = -1 and apr.admin_id = #{adminId} ) union select p.* from admin_permission_relation apr left join permission p on p.id = apr.permission_id where apr.type = 1 and apr.admin_id = #{adminId}
